function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in inactivating SARS-CoV-1 and MERS-CoV compared to influenza A","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of coronaviruses in the environment","Mitigation":"Research and develop more effective methods for inactivating coronaviruses","Technologies":"Improved UV-C irradiation methods, advanced disinfection techniques","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in high-traffic environments","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Substrate or medium influencing the magnitude of the Z value achieved for inactivating microbes","Impact":"Inconsistent and unpredictable efficacy of UV-C irradiation on different substrates or media","Mitigation":"Develop standardized protocols for UV-C irradiation based on different substrates and media","Technologies":"Standardized testing equipment, uniform testing conditions","People":"Researchers, testing laboratories, manufacturers of disinfection equipment","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, standardization organizations"},{"Description":"Low penetration depth of UV light through concentrated suspensions","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of UV-C irradiation on concentrated suspensions, leading to potential microbial survival","Mitigation":"Optimize UV-C exposure and develop methods to enhance penetration in concentrated suspensions","Technologies":"Advanced UV-C LED technology, enhanced UV-C penetration strategies","People":"Manufacturers of disinfection equipment, researchers, engineers","Owner":"Disinfection equipment companies, research institutions"}]}
